summary: This document is an email chain from August 2020 regarding the coordination of a call between the Epstein Victims' Compensation Program administrator and the FBI's Victim Services Division to discuss counseling services for victims of Jeffrey Epstein. It references the program's website and the FBI's resources.

persons.name: Jordy Feldman
persons.role: Administrator of the Epstein Victims' Compensation Program
persons.context: Serving as the administrator of the compensation program, coordinating a call with the FBI's Victim Services Division to discuss counseling services for Epstein's victims.

persons.name: Elena Vournas
persons.context: Copied on the email chain, involved in scheduling the call between Jordy Feldman and the FBI's Victim Services Division.

persons.name: Brittany Henderson
persons.context: Forwarded contact information for the FBI's Victim Services Division to Elena Vournas and Jordy Feldman, describing them as a resource for victims.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Referenced as the perpetrator whose victims are the subject of the compensation program and FBI counseling services.

connections.description: Feldman, as program administrator, is scheduling a call to discuss the FBI's counseling services for Epstein victims.
Henderson forwarded the FBI Victim Services contact, describing them as a wonderful resource for victims.
Feldman administers the compensation program for victims of Epstein's crimes.

events.title: Scheduled call between VCP and FBI Victim Services
events.description: A call scheduled for 1:00 PM between Jordy Feldman (Epstein Victims' Compensation Program) and the FBI's Victim Services Division to discuss counseling services.

events.title: FBI Victim Services statement provided
events.description: The FBI's Victim Services Division provided a statement for posting on the Epstein Victims' Compensation Program website regarding support for Epstein's victims.

keyFacts: Jordy Feldman was serving as the Administrator of the Epstein Victims' Compensation Program as of August 2020.
The FBI's Victim Services Division (VSD) was actively providing services and support to victims of Jeffrey Epstein and their contact information was posted on the compensation program's website.
A call was scheduled for August 11, 2020, to discuss the FBI's counseling services process for victims.

The email chain shows coordination between private legal entities (the compensation program, Edwards Pottinger LLC) and federal law enforcement (FBI VSD) regarding victim support post-Epstein's death.
